definition: such matters/things like this/this line of work/this pursuit/this hobby/this endeavor

sentences.english: This is thenichethattypography enthusiasts guard with fervor.

sentences.english: How can he in this strange and backward in technology?

sentences.english: The politicians all claim they understand this.

sentences.english: Once you accept this, your heart will never be broken again.
sentences.chinese: 当你心明此道，你的心将不会再碎了。
